commits.message:
Merge pull request #937 from eucalyptus/GUI-1207

GUI-1207: Revamped sharing panel for bucket/object details page
GUI-1207: Leverage refactored sharing panel ACL code on Create Bucket page as well
GUI-1207: Disallow "/" characters when renaming a file on the object details page
GUI-1207: Fix alignment of fields and buttons in sharing panel and metadata editor for bucket/object details page
GUI-1207: Allow metadata to be added/removed on object details page
GUI-1207: Allow sharing grants to be saved on the object details page
GUI-1207: Allow a bucket (and its contents) to be made public via the bucket details page
GUI-1207: Display objects count (fetched via XHR) on bucket details page, and link object count to bucket contents page
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-1207
GUI-1207: Display unsaved metadata warning modal when clicking the Save Changes button if an unsaved metadata entry is detected
GUI-1207: Display warning when navigating away from object details page with unsaved changes
GUI-1207: Remove code for and links to folder details page
GUI-1207: Initial progress on bucket item (folder/object) details page
GUI-1207: Hide logging status display for Euca on bucket details page.
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-1207
GUI-1207: Indicate required field for Account ID, with some workarounds to prevent the field from being required on the parent form.
GUI-1207: Allow ACLs updated on the bucket details page to be applied recursively to all objects in the bucket
GUI-1207: Wrap all calls to conn.get_bucket() with boto_error_handler context manager
GUI-1207: Fix cancel link URL on object details page
GUI-1207: Add metadata-like attributes to object metadata editor to be more consistent with the AWS Management Console's UX
GUI-1207: Initial progress on metadata editor panel for object details page
GUI-1207: Prevent duplicate grants in sharing panel on bucket details page
GUI-1207: Fix initial sort display on bucket contents page
GUI-1207: Disable logging status for Eucalyptus on bucket details page
GUI-1207: Disable "Add Account" button after adding an account for an ACL in the Sharing panel
GUI-1207: Display propagation warning modal when ACLs are updated on bucket details page
GUI-1207: Display last modified timestamp in the local time zone of the user agent on the S3 object details page
GUI-1207: Display warning modal on bucket/object details page when there's an unsaved sharing/ACL entry on form submit
GUI-1207: Enable any-input chosen widget for metadata key in metadata editor and disable the "Add Account" button in the sharing panel editor on the object details page.
GUI-1207: Simplify breadcrumbs generation code on folder/object details page
GUI-1207: Allow grants to be removed in the sharing panel on the buckets detail page
GUI-1207: Grr, bucket.creation_date is only available when fetching all buckets, so implement a workaround for displaying the creation date on the bucket details page.
GUI-1207: Initial progress on bucket details page.  Refactor bucket landing/contents page views based on code review feedback of GUI-1206
GUI-1207: Customize permission choices in sharing panel based on bucket/object type
GUI-1207: Initial progress on revamped sharing panel for bucket/object details page
GUI-1207: Allow any input for content-type field in metadata editor on object details page
GUI-1207: Disable "Save Changes" button until changes are detected on object details page
GUI-1206 and GUI-1207: Allow bucket versioning to be enabled or suspended from the landing page and details page
GUI-1207: More progress on the sharing panel widget for the bucket details page
GUI-1207: Token expiration responses for S3 return a 400 status code instead of the expected 403
GUI-1207: Fix alignment of manual controls in sharing panel

Merge pull request #905 from eucalyptus/GUI-1207

GUI-1207: Bucket and object detail pages
GUI-1207: Disable "Save Changes" button until changes are made and display warning when navigating away when there are unsaved changes on the bucket details page
GUI-1207: Allow S3 objects to be renamed, preventing file extension modification where applicable
GUI-1207: Simplify folder lookup on folder details page.  Wrap bucket/object lookup calls in boto_error_handler context manager
GUI-1207: Initial progress allowing grants to be added in the sharing panel on the bucket details page
GUI-1207: Initial progress on sharing panel for bucket details page
GUI-1207: Open link to file on object details page in a new window/tab
GUI-1207: Allow canned ACLs to be saved.  Refactor code to share ACL update handler between bucket and object details page.
GUI-1207: Display content-type choices (as an extensible Chosen widget) when the key is 'Content-Type' in the metadata editor on the object details page
GUI-1207: Return 404 page when folder/object lookup fails
GUI-1207: Display item link on object details page.  Enable download action on object details and bucket contents pages.  Convert account id in sharing panel to text input field.
GUI-1207: Initial progress on form for S3 sharing panel widget
GUI-1207: Add ownership and logging status to bucket details page
